paper_abstract: We show that a commutative bounded integral orthomodular lattice is residuated iff it is a Boolean algebra. This result is a consequence of (Ward, Dilworth in Trans Am Math Soc 45, 336-354, 1939, Theorem 7.31); however, out proof is independent and uses other instruments.
paper_title: Commutative bounded integral residuated orthomodular lattices are Boolean algebras
